name: Esclavas
overview: Roberto Arce conducts this documentary space that recreates real cases of trafficking in women for the purpose of sexual exploitation, with the aim of sensitizing society to the importance of differentiating freely practiced prostitution from trafficking in women and denouncing this criminal activity
